--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Ostermueller, Erik"
<erik.ostermueller@f...> wrote:
> Hello, all.
> 
> This post isn't necessarily JUnit related,
> but it is very unit-testing related.
> 
> With our legacy mainframe system,
> it is not possible to add or
> delete data on the fly (ie, from a unit test) -- you have to rely on 
> nightly batch processes for this.
> 
> Since the unit tests can't set up and tear down 
> their own data, we're running into lots of snags.

To quote Bob Martin: "So, what are you going to do about it?"

Dave
